import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { addProduct } from '../actions/action'; import { bindActionCreators } from 'redux'; class AddProduct extends Component { state = { ProductName: "", Category: "Mobiles", Condition: "Mint", Bargain: false, Price: "", City: "Bengaluru", Nothing: true } addData = () => { let shopData = { "data": { "ProductName": this.state.ProductName, "Category": this.state.Category, "Condition": this.state.Condition, "Bargain": this.state.Bargain, "Price": this.state.Price, "City": this.state.City, "Nothing": this.state.Nothing } } this.props.addProduct(shopData) } handleOnSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() this.addData() } render() { return (

) } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { console.log("current state", state) return { } } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return bindActionCreators({ addProduct }, dispatch) } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(AddProduct)
